title: Vietnam social media user penetration 2017 to 2023
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of population, with a total of 7 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2022 to 2017.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly neutral which exists from 2023 to 2022.
gold: This statistic presents the social networking reach in Vietnam from 2017 to 2023 . In 2017 , 46 percent of the population in the country accessed social media . In 2019 , this share is projected to reach 49 percent .
